description: FABULOUS FLOORPLAN. This corner unit on the quiet interior end of 3 townhouses is the only unit that overlooks green space.  It has a formal living & dining room plus family & tv room. It has 3 spacious bedrooms and full bath on the 2nd floor plus a powder room on the main floor. The large master bedroom has a full ensuite and a walk-in closet. The large yard has been newly updated. Two parking spots incl. one car attached garage. The Elementary School is a short walk, and a produce shop is at the corner. Close to Steveston Village.  The townhouse is 15-minute walk to the water & the dike trail or to Safeway or SaveOnFoods. Measurements are approx. Buyer to verify if deemed important. SHOWN By Appointment ONLY 24 hrs. Notice please. Call your Realtor to arrange a viewing.
